com.att.aro.commonui

Class MessageDialogFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JOptionPane
            • com.att.aro.commonui.MessageDialogFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class MessageDialogFactory
extends javax.swing.JOptionPane
    A factory class for displaying common message dialogs used by the ARO Data Analyzer.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • showUnexpectedExceptionDialog

        public static void showUnexpectedExceptionDialog(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                                 java.lang.Throwable t)
        Displays a dialog that is used for reporting unexpected exceptions to the user. The error dialog is associated with the specified parent window, and contains the specified exception. Unexpected exceptions can be I/O exceptions or other checked exceptions that can be handled locally.
        Parameters:
        parentComponent - The parent window to associate with this dialog.
        t - The exception that should be thrown for this error.

      • showInvalidTraceDialog

        public static void showInvalidTraceDialog(java.lang.String strTraceDir,
                          java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                          java.lang.Throwable t)
        Displays an error dialog for the specified invalid trace file name. The error dialog is associated with the specified parent window, and contains the specified exception.
        Parameters:
        strTraceDir - The trace directory of the invalid trace file.
        parentComponent - The parent window to associate with this dialog.
        t - The exception that should be thrown for this error.

      • showInvalidDirectoryDialog

        public static void showInvalidDirectoryDialog(java.lang.String strTraceDir,
                              java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                              java.lang.Throwable t)
        Displays an error dialog for the specified invalid directory. The error dialog is associated with the specified parent window, and contains the specified exception.
        Parameters:
        strTraceDir - The invalid directory.
        parentComponent - The parent window to associate with this dialog.
        t - The exception that should be thrown for this error.

      • showErrorDialog

        public static void showErrorDialog(java.awt.Window window,
                   java.lang.String message,
                   java.lang.String title)
        Displays an error dialog with the specified title. The error dialog is associated with the specified parent window, and contains the specified message.
        Parameters:
        window - The parent window to associate with this dialog.
        message - The message to be displayed in the dialog.
        title - The dialog title.

      • showErrorDialog

        public static void showErrorDialog(java.awt.Window window,
                   java.lang.String message)
        Displays an error dialog using the default title. The error dialog is associated with the specified parent window, and contains the specified message.
        Parameters:
        window - The parent window to associate with this dialog.
        message - The message to be displayed in the dialog.

      • showConfirmDialog

        public static int showConfirmDialog(java.awt.Component parentComponent,
                    java.lang.String message,
                    int optionType)
        Displays a confirmation dialog using the default title. The confirmation dialog is associated with the specified parent window, contains the specified message, and uses the specified optionType.
        Parameters:
        parentComponent - The parent window to associate with this dialog.
        message - The message to be displayed in the dialog.
        optionType - An int that identifies the dialog option type.

      • showExportConfirmDialog

        public static int showExportConfirmDialog(java.awt.Component parentComponent)
        Displays a confirmation dialog for exporting data from a table. The dialog uses the default title, and is associated with the specified parent window.
        Parameters:
        parentComponent - The parent window to associate with this dialog.
